title: Add monteCarlo Stream Evaluator to support Monte Carlo simulations
description:
The monteCarlo Stream Evaluator will run Monte Carlo simulations using the new probability distribution framework in Solr 7.

More details on this to follow...

comments.content: I'll also add a constant probability distribution which will be useful for testing Monte Carlo formulas as part of this ticket.
comments.author: Joel Bernstein

comments.content: Added constant distribution. Tests to follow...
